title: Supply isolated
fullText:
EFLI testing is not specifically required for circuits supplying equipment other than socket-outlets because of the risk of electric shock when performing the test on live electrical equipment.
For a circuit that is not RCD protected and supply is not available see Clause 4.8.4.2. Where EFLI testing is to be undertaken, test to ensure the circuits are de-energized.
When testing de-energized, consider the most appropriate location to place the temporary connection (active to earth).
NOTE For guidance on appropriate locations, see Figure 4.25.
